alert.note: Alert for Big Cypress; Glades County; Glades County Lake Region; Hendry County; Hendry County Lakes Region; Northern Collier; Southwest Collier (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued March 30 at 2:52AM EDT until March 30 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 7 PM EDT THIS EVENING FOR FOR RELATIVE HUMIDITY BELOW 35 PERCENT AND SUSTAINED 20 FOOT WINDS GREATER THAN 15 MPH ALONG WITH ERC`S OF 27 OR GREATER FOR FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 163...166...170...263...266...270 AND 370... The National Weather Service in Miami has issued a Red Flag Warning...which is in effect from 2 PM this afternoon to 7 PM EDT this evening. * Affected area...fire weather zones 163...166...170...263... 266...270 and 370. * Wind...15 TO 20 MPH * Humidity...Lower 30s * Impacts...any fires that develop will likely see extreme fire behavior. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
